words: Aadha tera, ishq aadha mera
Aise ho poora chandrama
O, taara tera, ek taara mera
Baaqi andhera aasaam
Na tere sang laage baandhe jo peepal pe dhaage
Yeh surme ke dhaare hain nazrein bacha ke
Bad-rang mein satranga hai yeh ishq re
Jogi main aur ganga hai yeh ishq re
Bad-rang mein satranga hai yeh ishq re
Jogi main aur ganga hai yeh ishq re
Maathe se laga loon haath choo ke main pair tere
Ho, rakh loon main tan pe zakhm bana saare bair tere
Rukkna nayin tu, hun russna nayin main
Tera nayin reha te na khud da vi main
Duniya tu hi hai meri, par na aana, ab na aana
Main nayin aana shehar tere
Jo phere sang laage, rakhte woh humko jala ke
Woh waade, jhoothe waade le ja tu qasme laga ke
Rag-rag mein malanga hai yeh ishq re
Kyun lahoo mein hi ranga hai yeh ishq re?
Ho, bad-rang mein satranga hai yeh ishq re
Jogi main aur ganga hai yeh ishq re
Tu meri saari yaadein paani mein aaj baha de
Yeh teri bheegi aankhein rakh loon labon se laga ke
Main samundar, pardinda hai yeh ishq re
Man maatam aur zinda hai yeh ishq re
Ho, bad-rang mein satranga hai yeh ishq re
Jogi main aur ganga hai yeh ishq re
Bad-rang mein satranga hai yeh ishq re
Jogi main aur ganga hai yeh ishq re
